channel.title: 2022 Book Reviews on jverkamp.com
channel.description: Recent content in 2022 Book Reviews on jverkamp.com

item.title: Hellblazer, Vol. 10: In the Line of Fire
item.description: Fortune telling, Constantine’s father, more evil demons and arguably worse angels, and of course dead soldiers who can’t find rest. Not a standout volume, but still pretty good. The Nature of the Beast Sure… Reading the future is a common enough trope in this genre, but I enjoyed it. Walking the Dog Another ghost story… …ish. Oops. A neat twist. Punkin’ Up the Great Outdoors Going to be a weird one:
